snippet: Pittsburgh’s bitter breakup with the Big East finally has an official separation date.
abstract: Pittsburgh and the Big East announce that the university will pay $7.5 million to join Syracuse in leaving the Big East for the Atlantic Coast Conference on July 1, 2013.
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh’s bitter breakup with the Big East finally has an official separation date.

headline.seo: Pitt and Big East Set Exit Date
headline.main: Pitt and Big East Set Exit Date
headline.print_headline: Pitt and Big East Set Exit Date
